comments:

reposotory it works fine.

Same NPE when I try to 'share Project' to this reposetory. Using Integrational build 20020409.

What is the format of you repository path? It should use the windows format 
(i.e. D:\cvs\root)

I figured out the reason: the CVS was new and couldn't add a temp folder to d:\temp and gave an error 
message. I got another CVS Prgram and the could read the message. Would be nice if eclipse would 
show such messages as well.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 21134 ***
